positions.title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Developed and maintained scalable, production-grade microservices using Python (FastAPI) for high-traffic, business-critical workflows.
Built and deployed containerized services with Docker and AWS (ECR, ECS Fargate), integrated into automated CI/CD pipelines.
Designed and deployed distributed, event-driven data pipelines on AWS, reducing manual reporting effort by 90%.
Provisioned fault-tolerant, multi-environment cloud infrastructure using Java and AWS CDK, improving deployment consistency and system resilience.
Implemented proactive monitoring and alerting with AWS CloudWatch, reducing incident response times by 50%.
Refactored a latency-sensitive analytics API, applying OOP and modular design to achieve a 43% reduction in average response time.
Improved a face-matching model's F1 score from 70% to 93% through algorithm refinement and data tuning.
